# Smart Commit usage (Jira):
# Each line with a command must repeat the issue key. Blank lines break parsing.
# WRONG:
#   Commit summary\n\nLWB-123\n#time 1h
# RIGHT:
#   Commit summary\n\nLWB-123 #time 1h\nLWB-123 #comment Adjust thresholds
# Examples:
# LWB-19 #time 30m #comment Refactor coverage rules
# LWB-24 #time 45m #comment Improve ADR 0004 wording

# If multiple issues:
# LWB-19 #comment Update build script
# LWB-24 #time 10m

# Avoid stuffing unrelated work into one commit; prefer one issue focus.

# Remove all instructional lines (#) before saving commit.
